summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 20 December to end of Monday 20 December GMT
description: Overcast and cold on Monday.<br/><br/>Any build-up of pollutants locally should be prevented by a North Sea airflow.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
